title: Manage an Engineering Change Request (ECR)
description: A design engineer has submitted an ECR to change the material of a bracket to a lighter alloy. This must be reviewed and approved.

tasks.description: Review the ECR for completeness, including the justification, cost analysis, and impact assessment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the ECR form is filled out correctly.

tasks.description: Route the ECR to a board of stakeholders (e.g., stress, manufacturing, procurement) for their review and approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent routes the ECR to the correct review board.

tasks.description: Once approved, update the official engineering drawing and bill of materials to reflect the change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the relevant engineering documents with the new material specification.
